GDevelop is an open-source game creator,: GDevelop is an open-source game creator, tailored for fast and intuitive game making.
Game examples/starters: Примери игара и основа за развој
Publish your web game on Poki: Publish your web game on Poki
GDevelop was created with love by: GDevelop је са пуно љубави направио
who added features, fixed bugs, sent new: који су додали функције, исправили грешке, послали нове примере, написали туторијале и помогли заједници.
BUB is a very special, one of a kind cri: BUB је нешто посебно, она је јединствено створење. Прецизније, она је [најневероватнија мачка на планети](http://lilbub.com)... и њена игра је направљена помоћу GDevelop-а!
The game is a retro 8-bit game, with bea: Игрица је ретро, 8-битна, са прелепим уметничким стилом и звучном позадином. Одликују је промене између нивоа, скривене тајне и нивои са пуно пуцања, газдама, непријатељима и бонусима.
Hyperspace Dogfights is a juicy jet-comb: Hyperspace Dogfights је сјајна игрица, по стилу налик на игрице са борбеним авионима у којој ћете избегавати масе технолошки заосталих непријатеља и пробијати се кроз њихове редове.
As your intergalactic intervention missi: Како Ваша интергалактичка мисија напредује, Ваш адаптивни хипер-млазњак ће еволуирати у нешто јаче и нешто необично како будете сакупљали неке од стотина предмета доступних у игрици.
Imagine and publish your games with GDev: Осмислите и објавите своје игрице помоћу GDevelop-а. Све долази са детаљним упутствима и примерима.
Add ads to your game with AdMob: Add ads to your game with AdMob
Use AdMob in your GDevelop games to disp: Use AdMob in your GDevelop games to display ads and reward videos to your players
Go to [AdMob website](https://www.google: Go to [AdMob website](https://www.google.com/admob/) and create an account. Then, create a new app from the AdMob interface and an ad unit. Note the identifiers for both the app and the ad unit, as they will be used in your game.
In GDevelop, open the properties of your: In GDevelop, open the properties of your game and paste the AdMob **app id**. This acts as the identification that allows AdMob to serve ads in your app.
Add events in your game to load and show: Add events in your game to load and show the ad when needed (this can be when a level is successfully completed for example). Paste the ad unit identifier into the parameters of the action. You can also enter "test" for loading a test ad.
You can test and publish your game on An: You can test and publish your game on Android directly from GDevelop. In the editor, open your game and then the Export window. Choose Android, click on Export and wait a few minutes.
How to publish to Android in one click: How to publish to Android in one click
The blog of the GDevelop team, contribut: The blog of the GDevelop team, contributors and community.
Contribute to GDevelop - Open-source HTM: Допринесите развоју GDevelop-а - HTML5 алату отвореног кода за израду игрица
GDevelop is an open-source project (even: GDevelop је пројекат отвореног кода (чак и ова веб страница): свако може да допринесе и унапреди софтвер!
There are multiple ways you can contribu: Постоји више начина на који можете допринети развоју пројекта GDevelop, у зависности од времена, способности и интересовања.
GDevelop and the website can be translat: GDevelop и пратећи веб сајт могли би бити преведени и на Ваш језик! Преводи се обављају на веб сајту на коме је свако добродошао.
It's easy to get the source code of GDev: Једноставно се може приступити изворном коду GDevelop-а и почети са унапређивањем ствари!
The forum and the Discord chat are the p: Форум и Discord chat су места на којима можете потражити или понудити помоћ другим корисницима GDevelop-а!
Follow GDevelop on Facebook and Twitter:: Пратите GDevelop на Facebook-у и Twitter-у:
For most beginners and even advanced use: За већину почетника, па чак и напредне кориснике, туторијали и help страница представљају највредније ресурсе који показују како се брзо могу креирати сјајне игрице. На wiki страници, можете писати нове туторијале или унапредити постојеће.
Create custom behaviors for your game ob: Create custom behaviors for your game objects in GDevelop
In a few clicks, you can create new beha: In a few clicks, you can create new behaviors for your game objects - using events or JavaScript.
Flash is a custom behavior that is creat: Flash is a custom behavior that is created directly from GDevelop - allowing an object to blink
Create custom behaviors - directly from: Create custom behaviors - directly from GDevelop editor
GDevelop allows you to create new behavi: GDevelop allows you to create new behaviors, using the same events as the ones that you're using to create the rules of your game.
Want enemies to automatically follow the: Want enemies to automatically follow the player?
Want some rockets to target the player?: Want some rockets to target the player?
Want enemies and the players to have hea: Want enemies and the players to have health and take damage?
Behaviors can be created for any kind of: Behaviors can be created for any kind of object, and you can create custom actions and conditions associated to your new behavior.
An action is exposed by the behavior, an: An action is exposed by the behavior, and can be used like any other action in the events
Read the documentation about custom beha: Read the documentation about custom behaviors
Import new behaviors, created by the GDe: Import new behaviors, created by the GDevelop community
Behaviors, as well as extensions, can be: Behaviors, as well as extensions, can be shared between projects. You can **export and import** them in a few clicks. If your behavior is generic and reusable in multiple games, you can even submit it to be integrated in the growing list of custom behaviors shared by the community.
Create your game by assembling behaviors: Create your game by assembling behaviors
Progressively create custom behaviors fo: Progressively create custom behaviors for objects in your game
ideal for large games and keeping simple: ideal for large games and keeping simple events.
Search for new behaviors in the list of: Search for new behaviors in the list of behaviors shared by the community
Download GDevelop or try it online - cre: Преузмите GDevelop или га испробајте онлајн - направите игрице без програмирања
GDevelop is free and can be used for pro: GDevelop је бесплатан и може се користити за прављење профитабилних или непрофитабилних игрица.
GDevelop runs on Windows, macOS and most: GDevelop је подржан на Windows, macOS и најновијим Linux оперативним системима. Можете га испробати и онлајн, користећи Chrome, Firefox или неки други од новијих веб претраживача.
This is an [AppImage](https://appimage.o: This is an [AppImage](https://appimage.org/). **Make it executable first** and run it. For example: `chmod a+x GDevelop*.AppImage && ./GDevelop*.AppImage`.
You can also [download GDevelop as a tor: You can also [download GDevelop as a torrent](https://fosstorrents.com/games/gdevelop/). Thanks to fosstorrents.com for managing these torrents.
Wonder what's new in latest versions? Fi: Wonder what's new in latest versions? Find the release notes in the app or [online](https://github.com/4ian/GDevelop/releases).
To create your first game, start by read: To create your first game, start by reading or watching a tutorial:
GDevelop is an open-source project. You: GDevelop је пројекат отвореног кода. Можете се прикључити заједници и унапредити га!
Gdevelop 4 can still be downloaded. GDev: GDevelop 4 се и даље може преузети. GDevelop 5 се препоручује новим корисницима, пошто за GDevelop 4 неће бити нових update-ова! У будућности ће изостати и подршка за GDevelop 4: препоручујемо свим корисницима верзије GDevelop 4 да се пребаце на GDevelop 5.
GDevelop 4 is old and not supported anym: GDevelop 4 is old and not supported anymore. We recommend switching to GDevelop 5, which is compatible with most GDevelop 4 games, has many new features and an improvement user interface.
GDevelop for the education - Teach game: GDevelop за образовне сврхе - Подучавајте прављење игрица
Using GDevelop in classroom is a perfect: Коришћење GDevelop-а у учионици представља савршену прилику да се подстакне креативност ученика, да се науче програмирању и прављењу игрица.
GDevelop has already been used in classr: GDevelop је већ пронашао своје место у учионицама и на онлајн курсевима. Погодан је и за студенте дигиталних медија и за ђаке прваке!
Please send us your photos and tweets if: Молимо Вас да нам пошаљете своје фотографије и tweet-ове како користите GDevelop на својим предавањима!
Install new extensions in GDevelop and s: Install new extensions in GDevelop and share yours
Install new extensions and share them: Install new extensions and share them
Search and add new features to your game: Search and add new features to your game in a few clicks.
Search in the library of extensions, rea: Search in the library of extensions, ready to be installed in one click
Directly from the editor, you can explor: Directly from the editor, you can explore the **online library of extensions** (also called a "package manager" or an "extension store"). Extensions can bring *new behaviors* for your game objects, or *actions, conditions* or expressions that are ready to use in events.
**Featured extensions** are peer reviewe: **Featured extensions** are peer reviewed. They are ideal to add new features at a fast pace to your game, making both prototyping of new games a very quick process and allowing larger games to be constructed by assembling extensions.
Export your own extensions and share the: Export your own extensions and share them
All extensions can be exported to a file: All extensions can be exported to a file. They can easily be shared and integrated to another project. Better, if you have created a useful extension, you can submit it to be integrated to the library of [open-source, community extensions](https://github.com/4ian/GDevelop-extensions).
As extensions are constructed using the: As extensions are constructed using the intuitive GDevelop events sheets, they can be composed of events, [JavaScript or a mix of both](/javascript-game-engine).
How to start a new extension: How to start a new extension
Extensions can provide new behaviors tha: Extensions can provide new behaviors that can be added to your game objects.
Make Facebook Instant Games with GDevelo: Make Facebook Instant Games with GDevelop - publish your games on Messenger
With GDevelop, you can export your game: Уз помоћ GDevelop-а, можете да извезете своју игрицу у форми Facebook Инстант Игрице у само 2 клика.
1) Create your app on Facebook Developer: 1) Направите своју апликацију на Facebook Developers
First thing, make sure to have an accoun: Прва ствар, будите сигурни да имате налог на **Facebook Developers**. Направите апликацију и подесите је тако што ћете одабрати "Games" као категорију и дозволити (енабле) "Instant Games" у "Products":
2) Open GDevelop and export for Facebook: 2) Отворите GDevelop и извезите за Facebook Инстант Игрице
In GDevelop, open your game and then the: У оквиру GDevelop-а, отворите своју игрицу, а затим прозор "Извоз". Изаберите **Facebook Инстант Игрице**, кликните на "Извези" и сачекајте неколико секунди.
Go back to your game page on Facebook De: Вратите се на страницу своје игрице у оквиру Facebook Developers, одаберите Web Hosting у менију и **аплоудујте фајл** који сте извезли помоћу GDevelop-а.
You can also add testers to let your fri: Такође, можете додати тест кориснике и позвати пријатеље да испробају Вашу игрицу.
More about uploading your game: Више информација о томе како аплоудовати игрицу
Now, get your phone and **open messenger: Сада, узмите телефон и **отворите Messenger**. Отворите конверзацију, изаберите "Games" и кликните на иконицу игрице како бисте започели игру!
5) Use Instant Games features and publis: 5) Користите "Instant Games" могућности и објавите своју игрицу!
GDevelop gave you access to Instant Game: GDevelop Вам пружа приступ специфичним опцијама у оквиру Instant Games, на пример, имену играча, како бисте боље интегрисали игрицу у конверзације преко Messenger-а.
When your game is ready, submit it for r: Када Ваша игрица буде спремна, пошаљите је за оцењивање од стране Facebook-а, како би **постала доступна корисницима широм света**!
Read the full step-by-step tutorial: Прочитајте детаљни туторијал, корак по корак
Features of GDevelop - create any kind o: Опције GDevelop-а - направите било који тип игрице, без кодирања

One click export to [Facebook Instant Ga: Извезите једним кликом за [Facebook Instant Games](/facebook-instant-games), да бисте играли на Messenger-у.
Export as a stand-alone executable game: Извезите игрицу као самосталну, stand-alone executable, за Windows, macOS и Linux
Publish your game on [Poki](/poki), Kong: Publish your game on [Poki](/poki), Kongregate, Itch.io and other gaming websites!
Display [ads and reward videos](/ads-in-: Display [ads and reward videos](/ads-in-your-game-with-admob) to your players using [AdMob](/ads-in-your-game-with-admob).
Learn how to publish your game: Научите како да објавите своју игрицу
Create explosions, fire and impressive e: Направите експлозије, ватру и импресивне ефекте помоћу алата **Particle Emitters**
**Tiled sprites**, to create mosaics, fl: **Tiled sprites**, to create mosaics, floors and repeating patterns
Formatted rich text with **BB Text** obj: Formatted rich text with **BB Text** objects
Draw custom shapes on screen with **Shap: Draw custom shapes on screen with **Shape Painters**
Author maps of your tile-based game in T: Author maps of your tile-based game in Tiled and import them in a **Tilemap** object
Dozens of visual effects are bundled wit: Dozens of visual effects are bundled with GDevelop
Blur, Noise, CRT effect, Color Map, Chro: Blur, Noise, CRT effect, Color Map, Chromatic Aberration, Glow, Shadows...
Add your own effects by [creating new ex: Add your own effects by [creating new extensions for the game engine](/javascript-game-engine).
Learn how to use effects in GDevelop: Learn how to use effects in GDevelop
Add behaviors to your game objects: Додајте опције понашања Ваших објеката у игрици
Have your objects move and avoiding obst: Нека се Ваши објекти померају и избегавају препреке
quickly make your objects draggable with: направите брзо објекте који се могу носити мишем/додиром
support multiple screen sizes by ensurin: support multiple screen sizes by ensuring controls stay at the right position
smoothly animate object positions, sizes: smoothly animate object positions, sizes, opacity and colors
And more, to automate current tasks and: И још пуно тога, аутоматизујте тренутне задатке и понашања објеката у само неколико кликова!
Dozens of additional behaviors are avail: Dozens of additional behaviors are available throught community extensions, which can be discovered and imported in one click directly from the GDevelop editor.
Read the documentation for all behaviors: Прочитајте документацију за сва понашања објеката
Make desktop & mobile-ready games: Направите игрице спремне за десктоп или мобилне уређаје
Save player data in the browser storage: Save player data in the browser storage or on their devices
Full support for sound effects and music: Пуна подршка за звучне ефекте и музику
Support for touchscreens & multi-touch: Подршка за екране осетљиве на додир и multi-touch
The scene editor lets you visually edit: Едитор сцене Вам омогућава да визуелно уређујете нивое
Add interfaces and create parallax effec: Додајте интерфејс и направите ефекат паралаксе
Create your levels dynamically with exte: Учините нивое динамичним помоћу екстерних layouts-а
a powerful pixel art and sprite editor: моћни пиксел арт и sprite едитор
create effects and customize them in a f: create effects and customize them in a few clicks
Inspect the content of your game and mak: Проверите садржај Ваше игрице и унесите динамичке измене док прегледате своју игрицу
[monitor the resource expensive spots](h: [мотрите на ствари које захтевају пуно ресураса](http://wiki.compilgames.net/doku.php/gdevelop5/interface/debugger/profile-your-game) у Вашој игрици
Super fast development with Live Preview: Super fast development with Live Preview
When editing your game in the editor, ju: When editing your game in the editor, just press a single button to **apply your changes to the running game**.
It's a great way to tweak your game, bui: It's a great way to tweak your game, build your levels or test the gameplay without having to restart from scratch after every changes, helping you stay focused.
Preview your games **on other devices (p: Preview your games **on other devices (phone, tablets, other computers)** using the *Network Preview* - without having to export them. Useful to quickly validate the gameplay on smaller devices, verify the game performance and playtest the game with testers.
Even better, it's compatible with Live P: Even better, it's compatible with Live Preview: do changes in the editor and they will be applied to the game run on your external devices or browsers.
Learn more about Live Preview and Networ: Learn more about Live Preview and Network Preview
Build ambitious games with advanced feat: Направите амбициозну игрицу са напредним функцијама
Communicate with external websites or se: Communicate with external websites or services using HTTP requests.
Create reusable **functions** using even: Create reusable **functions** using events, that can be used as actions, conditions or expressions in your game
a powerful feature never seen in other g: a powerful feature never seen in other game creation tools.
Manipulate variables with arbitrary comp: Manipulate variables with arbitrary complex structures, with support for reading/writing JSON.
You can [use JavaScript to code](/javasc: You can [use JavaScript to code](/javascript-game-engine) parts of your game
use it for a few functions, to write ext: use it for a few functions, to write extensions or the majority of your game.
Display ads in your game with [AdMob](/a: Display ads in your game with [AdMob](/ads-in-your-game-with-admob) or link to products from your [Shopify shop](http://wiki.compilgames.net/doku.php/gdevelop5/all-features/shopify).
Search and [install new features with ex: Search and [install new features with extensions](/extensions-and-sharing), built by the community
get new, ready to use features for your: get new, ready to use features for your game in a few clicks
All editors of GDevelop - make platforme: Сви едитори GDevelop-а - направите платформу, пуцачину, rpg, акционе игрице...
The interface of GDevelop is made of int: Интерфејс GDevelop-а чине интуитивни едитори којима можете дизајнирати своје игрице почевши од нуле.
See how to use GDevelop to add a trigger: Погледајте како да помоћу GDevelop-а, додате окидач у своју игрицу за само 90 секунди
Design your own levels with the scene ed: Дизајнирајте нивое помоћу едитора сцена: можете одабрати објекте, поставити их у сцене, подесити њихову позицију и величину. Можете у потпуности дизајнирати нивое помоћу едитора сцена. Ако желите, можете направити комплексне нивое и интерфејсе, екстерни layout-и омогућавају Вам да креирате делове нивоа које затим можете поново искористити у другим сценама.
Get started in 2 minutes: Try GDevelop i: Почните за само 2 минута: Испробајте GDevelop у свом веб претраживачу
Imagining and creating the rules of your: Imagining and creating the rules of your game do not imply to learn the syntax of a complex programming language. The events editor displays a sheet of events: each events is composed of conditions and actions. When conditions are fulfilled, actions are run. It's that simple.
All conditions and actions are available: Сви услови и акције су доступне као листа, како бисте лако открили и пронашли све што је потребно да осмислите правила за Вашу игру.
Learn more about events in the tutorials: Научите више о догађајима, у туторијалима
Create mario-like games with GDevelop: Направите игрице налик на Марија користећи GDevelop
Everything that is displayed on the scre: Све што видите приказано на екрану Ваше игрице је некакав објекат. Већина објеката спадају у категорију "sprites": они се састоје од анимација и могу се користити као анимирани елемент. На пример, Ваш јунак, непријатељи или неки од бонуса који се сакупљају.
Other object are also available to creat: Остали објекти су такође доступни приликом прављења интерфејса или како би се додали ефекти у игрицу; текст, честице, tiled sprites...
Discover all the objects available in GD: Откријте све објекте доступне у GDevelop-у
Resources editor, sprite editor and soun: Resources editor, sprite editor and sound effect generator
All the images and audio files used in y: Све слике и аудио фајлови који се користе у Вашој игрици излистани су у Едитору за ресурсе. На тај начин лако можете контролисати све елементе потребне за израду игрице.
GDevelop comes bundled with free assets: GDevelop comes bundled with free assets to get you started! To quickly prototype and create your own assets, GDevelop is also bundled with a powerful pixel art editor called Piskel. You can also create sound effect in a single click using the integrated sound generator. It's perfect for [game jams](/game-jams/)!
Learn everything about the editors in th: Научите све о едиторима, у приложеној документацији
Examples of GDevelop - make platformer,: Примери GDevelop игрица - направите платформу, пуцачину, rpg, акционе игрице...
GDevelop is bundled with 120+ examples a: GDevelop is bundled with 120+ examples and starters to get you quickly started, learn or try a specific feature.
These are the examples bundled with GDev: Овде можете видети примере који су повезани са GDevelop-ом. Копка Вас да сазнате како раде? Можете их отворити директно из претраживача. GDevelop је брз и на екрану ће Вам се после свега пар секунди појавити примери које можете испробавати.
Learn step-by-step how to use GDevelop o: Научите, корак по корак, како да користите GDevelop, или потражите помоћ која се односи на специфичну особину: wiki нуди туторијале за почетнике и комплетну документацију за софтвер.
GDevelop is a perfect fit for quickly ma: GDevelop is a perfect fit for quickly making games during game jams.
GDevelop is bundled with **Piskel**, a s: GDevelop is bundled with **Piskel**, a sprite editor that is perfect to quickly draw your sprites and for pixel-art.
Read more about making 8-bit and pixelar: Read more about making 8-bit and pixelart games
Generate sounds effects in one click: Generate sounds effects in one click
GDevelop has an integrated sound effect: GDevelop has an integrated sound effect generator, **Jfxr**. You can create sounds effects like explosions, jump, coins, power ups in a single click and customize them as you wish.
Read about all features available in GDe: Read about all features available in GDevelop
Want to create a retro platformer game?: Желите да направите платформу у ретро стилу? GDevelop садржи готова решења за behaviors (поступке) које можете придружити свом лику. У свега неколико секунди, имаћете базичну платформу која ради и само чека надоградњу и машту! Остали behaviors, услови и радње се такође могу користити за израду 2D игрица свих врста, укључујући: пуцачине, "Bullet Hell", аркадне игрице...
GDevelop for Game studios, indies and Ed: GDevelop for Game studios, indies and Education
GDevelop is a fast and flexible game eng: GDevelop is a fast and flexible game engine that can be used for different use cases.
GDevelop is a lightweight game engine, c: GDevelop is a lightweight game engine, carefully designed and open-source. The unique design of the editor has been explained during [talks in international conferences](PLACEHOLDER_LINK_DO_NOT_TRANSLATE).
MIT license: extend and contribute to th: MIT license: extend and contribute to the engine source code
Adaptable editor based on JavaScript, Re: Adaptable editor based on JavaScript, React.js and WebAssembly
Integrate GDevelop in your team, use eve: Integrate GDevelop in your team, use events or JavaScript according to your needs
Get game designers, artists and develope: Get game designers, artists and developers to work on the same environment
Game projects are human readable and sup: Game projects are human readable and support version control systems like Git or Mercurial
Companies can provide commercial or free: Companies can provide commercial or free support for GDevelop:

Accessible and easy to learn, GDevelop i: Accessible and easy to learn, GDevelop is ideal for indie game developers. You'll be able to quickly start a game and iterate by using events, behaviors and new extensions.
Free to use: download GDevelop and start: Free to use: download GDevelop and start making a game today
Integrated editors allowing to make game: Integrated editors allowing to make game assets directly from GDevelop
Super fast prototyping with open-source: Super fast prototyping with open-source community extensions and behaviors
Custom behaviors make your game logic re: Custom behaviors make your game logic reusable and shareable
Teaching game creation or programming to: Teaching game creation or programming to kids or students? GDevelop has been used by dozens of schools, universities and bootcamp programs for all ages.
Learn more about GDevelop and education: Learn more about GDevelop and education
Screenshot of Lil BUB's HELLO EARTH, a g: Screenshot of Lil BUB's HELLO EARTH, a game made with GDevelop, the open-source game making app
Make games with a fast, intuitive game e: Make games with a fast, intuitive game engine
Here are a few games created with GDevel: Ево неколико игрица које су направљене помоћу GDevelop-а. Следећа би могла бити Ваша!
Made a nice game with GDevelop?: Желите ли да направите лепу игрицу помоћу GDevelop-а?
We'll love to know about your game and a: Волели бисмо да сазнамо о Вашој игрици и да је поставимо овде. Потрудите се да направите лепе screenshot-ове и да квалитет игрице буде на високом нивоу :)
Hyperspace Dogfights, a game created wit: Hyperspace Dogfights, игрица направљена помоћу GDevelop-а
A juicy jet-combat roguelike game, made: Сјајна игрица са борбеним млазњацима, направљена помоћу GDevelop-а.
Hyperspace Dogfights is a juicy jet-comb: Hyperspace Dogfights је сјајна игрица са борбеним млазњацима у којој ћете разносити масе технолошки инфериорних непријатеља кроз које ћете се пробијати док избегавате њихове нападе. Како Ваша интергалактичка мисија буде напредовала, Ваш адаптивни хипер-млазњак ће еволуирати у нешто још јаче и још необичније како будете сакупљали неке од стотина предмета који су доступни у игрици.
Hyperspace Dogfights began as a side pro: Hyperspace Dogfights је започео свој живот као под-пројекат нашег сада угашеног пројекта развоја игрице, Hyperspace Admirals, по жанру типичног свемирског истраживања. Прототип, HDog, изашао је крајем 2016, након чега је добио ограничени приступ на itch.io. Током 2017, већина садржаја је већ била развијена и континуирани алфа фидбек је узет у обзир. Све жељене опције су додате у игрицу до марта 2018, после чега је уследило званично објављивање.
Fierce and juicy 2d jet combat against m: Жестока и напета 2D битка против масовних напада непријатеља са копна и из ваздуха
Hundreds of stackable passives, over fif: На стотине пасива који се могу комбиновати, преко 50 оружја и актива на располагању; све синергистички уклопљено у једну целину
High replayability, your will evolve a l: Веома заразна игрица, пошто је еволуција авиона са сваким покушајем нешто другачија
Seven zones with distinct enemy composit: Седам зона са видно различитим саставом непријатеља које чекају да буду истражене
10+ screen-fillingbosses: 10+ великих газди, и борбе преко целог екрана
5+ Player hyper-jets to fly, all coming: 5+ хипер-млазњака на којима можете летети, а сваки од њих долази и у мк2 верзији коју морате откључати
16 chilled, multi-layered music tracks b: 16 слојевитих музичких подлога које су компоновали Enuit и Ole Toensen од којих се леди крв
Lil BUB's HELLO EARTH, a game created wi: Lil BUB's HELLO EARTH, игрица направљена помоћу GDevelop-а
A retro 8-bit game, with beautiful arts: Ретро 8-битна игрица, са феноменалним пиксел-артом и музичком подлогом, направљена помоћу GDevelop-а.
Using GDevelop, the game was made availa: Захваљујући GDevelop-у, игрица је постала доступна за iOS, Android, Windows, macOS, Linux и чак је публикована као права Аркадна игрица.
The game was announced for BUB's 5th bir: Игрица је најављена за 5. рођендан BUB-а. Како би се то преточило у реалност, лансирана је Kickstarter кампања како би сви пријатељи BUB-а широм света могли да допринесу. Првобитни циљ Kickstarter кампање, био је 100,000 $, а сакупљено је чак 148,000 $! БРАВО BUB!
Huge variety of unique levels, bosses an: Висока разноврсност јединствених нивоа, газди и непријатеља
Unique storyline with twists and surpris: Јединствени ток радње са обртима и изненађењима
Item Inventory: collect items to be used: Залихе додатака: сакупљајте предмете како бисте их стратешки искористили током напредовања кроз игрицу
Tape Deck feature that allows you to sel: Tape Deck опција која Вам омогућава да одаберете своју омиљену музику из игрице
Ability to revisit and replay levels to: Могућност да поново посетите и поново одиграте нивое како бисте додатно напредовали и откључали постигнућа
GDevelop - Create games without programm: GDevelop - Направите игрице без програмирања - нативни креатор за игрице базиран на отвореном коду и HTML5
GDevelop game maker software - create vi: GDevelop софтвер за прављење игрица - направите игрице без потребе за кодирањем
GDevelop is an open-source, cross-platfo: GDevelop is an open-source, cross-platform game engine designed for everyone - it's extensible, fast and easy to learn.
Join the community on [Discord](https://: Join the community on [Discord](https://discord.gg/rjdYHvj) and on our [forums](https://forum.gdevelop-app.com).
Unleash your creativity with GDevelop an: Ослободите своју креативност уз GDevelop и направите било који тип игрице: платформе, слагалице, пуцачине, стратегије, [8-битне игрице](/make-8bit-pixelart-games)... Прођите кроз примере и надограђујте их или отпочните потпуно нови пројекат.
With GDevelop, you can make simple proje: Уз помоћ GDevelop-а, можете направити једноставне пројекте забаве ради или амбициозне игрице попут [Lil BUB's HELLO EARTH](/games/lil-bub-hello-earth), [Hyperspace Dogfights](/games/hyperspace-dogfights) и [многих других](/games-showcase)!
Make 8-bit or pixel art games with GDeve: Make 8-bit or pixel art games with GDevelop
Make adventure and point'n'click games w: Make adventure and point'n'click games with GDevelop
Events: game creation, intuitive for all: Events: game creation, intuitive for all
What makes GDevelop unique and so easy t: Оно што GDevelop чини јединственим и једноставним за коришћење јесте опција додавања догађаја (events). Догађаји су моћан алат којим можете исказати логику своје игрице, без потребе да научите програмски језик.
GDevelop takes visual programming to the: GDevelop takes visual programming to the next step, allowing you to add [ready-made behaviors](/features) to your game objects and [make new behaviors](/custom-behaviors) using these intuitive, easy to learn events.
Events being used in GDevelop to create: Догађаји се користе у GDevelop-у како би се креирала логика игрице
When Space is pressed, the character ani: When Space is pressed, the character animation and a sound are played. If an enemy touches the character, they both are destroyed.
Export your game anywhere, in one click: Export your game anywhere, in one click
Publish your games to the web, iOS, Andr: Објавите своје игрице на интернету, учините их доступним за iOS, Android, Windows, Mac, Linux па чак и [Facebook Messenger](/facebook-instant-games). Игрице направљене помоћу GDevelop-а раде било где, а можете их извести и за Android, у једном клику, из апликације.
Make games for iOS, Android, Windows, ma: Направите игрице за iOS, Android, Windows, macOS и Linux
Laptop, tablets or phone: games made wit: Лаптоп, таблет или телефон: игрице направљене помоћу GDevelop-а раде на свим уређајима
Express your small and big ideas: you ca: Express your small and big ideas: you can prototype new features on your games in minutes, and refine them without limits. [Making games](/games-showcase) has never been so easy and fast, with [the visual editors](/game-editors) provided by GDevelop.
Want to go even further? You can extend: Желите ли да још више напредујете? Можете проширивати [енџин игрице помоћу Javascript-а](/javascript-game-engine).
See how to add a trigger button to your: Погледајте како можете додати дугме-окидач (trigger) у своју платформу, за само 90 секунди
[Tons of examples](/game-examples-starte: [Брдо примера](/game-examples-starters) Вас спремно чека, на само један клик од Вас.
Tutorials for GDevelop and documentation: Туторијали за GDevelop и документација на wiki
Using JavaScript to make your games with: Користите JavaScript како бисте правили игрице помоћу GDevelop-а
GDevelop supports JavaScript to create y: GDevelop подржава JavaScript и уз њега ћете моћи да креирате игрице или проширите могућности енџина игрице.
JavaScript can be used to write part of: JavaScript се може користити како би се њиме написао део игрице, упоредо са догађајима (events)
Add JavaScript code blocks inside your g: Додајте блок JavaScript кода у Вашу игрицу
GDevelop supports adding JavaScript code: GDevelop подржава додавање блока JavaScript кода у било који део events-а у оквиру игрице. Захваљујући томе, могу се имплементирати комплексни алгоритми и наново користити функције из библиотека отвореног кода. Догађаји и блокови кода се тако стапају у једну целину, што Вам даје могућност да имплементирате делове JavaScript-а, па чак и читаву игрицу!
The JavaScript editor is based on the su: JavaScript едитор је базиран на супер моћном Monaco Editor Едитору, екстракованом из [Visual Studio Code](https://code.visualstudio.com/). Функције "Intellisense" су омогућене и едитор подржава напредне опције попут multi-selection, које кодирање чине бржим и лакшим.
Learn more about using JavaScript: Научите више о томе како се употребљава JavaScript
GDevelop is modular and can be extended: GDevelop је модуларан и могуће га је проширити према сопственим потребама. Све функције које се користите за развој игрице (објекти, понашања, догађаји) су доступне у виду екстензија. Врло брзо можете креирати нове екстензије за своју игрицу или можете допринети развоју постојећих пошто је GDevelop [open-source](https://github.com/4ian/GD).
The Dark theme being used in GDevelop. T: GDevelop користи Dark тему. Едитор кода долази са неколико прекрасних тема!
\n## Overview\n\nThis website (https://g:
## Overview

This website (https://gdevelop-app.com), related websites (https://forum.gdevelop-app.com, https://wiki.gdevelop-app.com, https://editor.gdevelop-app.com) and related applications (GDevelop), referred to as the Service, are operated by FLORIAN RIVAL. Throughout the site, the terms “we”, “us” and “our” refer to FLORIAN RIVAL.

This page is used to inform visitors and users regarding our policies with the collection, use, and disclosure of Personal Information if anyone decided to use the Service.

If you choose to use the Service, then you agree to the collection and use of information in relation to this policy. The Personal Information that we collect is used for providing and improving the Service. We will not use or share your information with anyone except as described in this Privacy Policy.

The terms used in this Privacy Policy have the same meanings as in our Terms and Conditions, which is accessible at https://gdevelop-app.com/legal/terms-and-conditions unless otherwise defined in this Privacy Policy.

## Information Collection and Use

For a better experience, while using our Service, we may require you, for example in the case of creating an account, to provide us with certain personally identifiable information, including but not limited to your email. The information that we request will be stored in a database of the Service.

The Service does use third party services that may collect information used to identify you.

## Log Data

We want to inform you that whenever you use the Service, in a case of an error in the app we collect data and information (through third party products) on your device called Log Data. This Log Data may include information such as your device Internet Protocol (“IP”) address, device name, operating system version, the configuration of the app when utilizing my Service, the time and date of your use of the Service, and other statistics.

These data are used to monitor the proper working on the Service and fix it in case of issues.

Link to privacy policy of some third party service providers used by the website and applications for Log Data:

- Sentry: https://sentry.io/privacy/

## Analytics Data

We want to inform you that whenever you use the Service, at various points in the app we collect data and information (through third party products) on your device called Analytics Data. This Analytics Data may include information such as your device Internet Protocol (“IP”) address, device name, operating system version, the configuration of the app when utilizing my Service, the time and date of your use of the Service, and other statistics.

These data are aggregated and used to understand how people use the Service and improve it.

Link to privacy policy of some third party service providers used by the website and applications for Analytics:

- Keen.io: https://keen.io/privacy-policy/
- Google Analytics: https://policies.google.com/privacy

## Cookies

Cookies are files with a small amount of data that are commonly used as anonymous unique identifiers. These are sent to your browser from the websites that you visit and are stored on your device's internal memory.
This Service stores a “cookie” when you create or log in to an account. However, the app may use third party code and libraries that use “cookies” to collect information and improve their services. You have the option to either accept or refuse these cookies and know when a cookie is being sent to your device. If you choose to refuse our cookies, you may not be able to use some portions of this Service.

## Service Providers

We may employ third-party companies and individuals due to the following reasons:

- To facilitate our Service;
- To provide the Service on our behalf;
- To perform Service-related services; or
- To assist us in analyzing how our Service is used.

We want to inform users of this Service that these third parties can have access to your Personal Information. The reason is to perform the tasks assigned to them on our behalf. However, they are obligated not to disclose or use the information for any other purpose.

Link to privacy policy of some third party service providers used by the website and applications:

- Google Play Services: https://policies.google.com/privacy
- Firebase: https://firebase.google.com/support/privacy
- Amazon Web Services: https://aws.amazon.com/privacy/

## Security

We value your trust in providing us your Personal Information, thus we are striving to use commercially acceptable means of protecting it. But remember that no method of transmission over the internet, or method of electronic storage is 100% secure and reliable, and we cannot guarantee its absolute security.

## Links to Other Sites

This Service may contain links to other sites. If you click on a third-party link, you will be directed to that site. Note that these external sites are not operated by us. Therefore, we strongly advise you to review the Privacy Policy of these websites. We have no control over and assume no responsibility for the content, privacy policies, or practices of any third-party sites or services.

## Your Rights and Choices in the EEA and Around the World

Where the EU General Data Protection Regulation 2016/679 (“GDPR”) applies to the processing of your personal data, especially when you access the website from a country in the European Economic Area (“EEA”), you have the following rights, subject to some limitations, against us:

* The right to access your personal data;
* The right to rectify the personal data we hold about you;
* The right to erase your personal data;
* The right to restrict our use of your personal data;
* The right to object to our use of your personal data;
* The right to receive your personal data in a usable electronic format and transmit it to a third party (also known as the right of data portability); and
* The right to lodge a complaint with your local data protection authority.

If you would like to exercise any of these rights, you may do so by mailing contact.gdevapp@gmail.com. Please understand, however, the rights enumerated above are not absolute in all cases.

Where the GDPR applies, you also have the right to withdraw any consent you have given to uses of your personal data. If you wish to withdraw consent that you have previously provided to us, you may do so by mailing contact.gdevapp@gmail.com. However, the withdrawal of consent will not affect the lawfulness of processing based on consent before its withdrawal.

We will undertake best efforts to provide these rights to people outside of the EEA as well.

## Children’s Privacy

These Services do not address anyone under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personally identifiable information from children under 13. In the case we discover that a child under 13 has provided us with personal information, We immediately delete this from our servers. If you are a parent or guardian and you are aware that your child has provided us with personal information, please contact us so that we will be able to do necessary actions.

## Changes to This Privacy Policy

We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. Thus, you are advised to review this page periodically for any changes. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page. These changes are effective immediately after they are posted on this page.

## Contact Us

If you have any questions or suggestions about our Privacy Policy, do not hesitate to contact us at [gdevelop-app-support@googlegroups.com](gdevelop-app-support@googlegroups.com).

## Attribution and License

This Privacy Policy is licensed under Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0 International (CC BY-SA 4.0). It is a derivative work of:

* [Red Hat’s Privacy Policy for the Fedora Project](https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/Legal:PrivacyPolicy), used under CC Attribution-Share Alike 3.0 Unported
* [The Free Software Foundation’s Privacy Policy](https://www.fsf.org/about/free-software-foundation-privacy-policy), used under Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0 International (CC BY-SA 4.0)
* [WordPress.org’s Privacy Policy](https://wordpress.org/about/privacy/), used under Attribution-ShareAlike 2.5 Generic (CC BY-SA 2.5)
Super fast game development with Live Pr: Super fast game development with Live Preview (Hot reload) and Network Preview (Preview over Wifi/LAN)
Live Preview and Preview over Wifi/LAN: Live Preview and Preview over Wifi/LAN
Achieve super fast game development with: Achieve super fast game development with Live Preview and previews on your external devices.
Live Preview: get your changes applied t: Live Preview: get your changes applied to your game while playing it
Live Preview, also called *hot reloading: Live Preview, also called *hot reloading*, is applying your changes to your game preview, without having to restart it. Design your level, change some events, add new objects, modify visual effects, then click on a button and the game preview will be updated automatically.
To start using Live Preview, just launch: To start using Live Preview, just launch a preview as usual. When the preview is running, go back to the editor, do some changes and press the Preview button again. That's it!
Network Preview: preview your game insta: Network Preview: preview your game instantly on other devices
Live Preview also works with the *Networ: Live Preview also works with the *Network Preview*. With the Network Preview, also called *Preview over WiFi/LAN*, you can try your game on your phone, tablet or even on other computer browsers - without having to export them. It's useful to quickly validate the gameplay on smaller devices, verify the game performance and try the game.
Learn how to run previews in GDevelop: Learn how to run previews in GDevelop
Sprite editor and tools to make your own: Sprite едитор и алати уз помоћ којих ћете креирати своје сопствене 8-битне игрице базиране на GDevelop-у
See Piskel sprite editor being used insi: Погледајте како се Piskel sprite едитор користи у GDevelop-у како би се направила 8-битна игрица
GDevelop is bundled with [Piskel](https:: GDevelop долази у пакету са [Piskel](https://www.piskelapp.com/), моћним, а лаким за коришћење, 2D sprite едитором. У питању је савршен алат помоћу којег ћете креирати пиксел-арт и својим игрицама удахнути ретро изглед! Можете креирати објекте са вишеструким анимацијама, у сваком моменту уређивати sprites-е и одмах видети резултат на екрану.
Lil BUB's HELLO EARTH: a 8 bit game made: Lil BUB's HELLO EARTH: 8-битна игрица направљена помоћу GDevelop -а
Lil BUB's HELLO EARTH is a retro 8-bit g: Lil BUB's HELLO EARTH је ретро, 8-битна игрица са предивном музичком подлогом и графичким дизајном, у којој се смењују нивои у виду платформи пуних тајни, нивои са пуцањем, газде, разни типови непријатеља и бонуси.
Read more about Lil BUB's game: Прочитајте нешто више о игрици Lil BUB
See other games made with GDevelop: Погледајте остале игрице направљене помоћу GDevelop-а
Your GDevelop game on the Poki web platf: Your GDevelop game on the Poki web platform
Get an audience of 30 million gamers fro: Get an audience of 30 million gamers from all over the world for your game.
Discover what Poki can do for your game: Discover what Poki can do for your game
[Poki.com](https://poki.com/) is a curat: [Poki.com](https://poki.com/) is a curated discovery platform for free, high-quality online games. Reach hundred of millions of players around the globe and get a lifetime revenue share from advertising when your game is played.
Export your game as an HTML5 game: Export your game as an HTML5 game
From GDevelop, choose to [export your ga: From GDevelop, choose to [export your game as HTML5](http://wiki.compilgames.net/doku.php/gdevelop5/publishing/html5_game_in_a_local_folder). The result is a web game, running with WebGL, that can be played on any recent desktop and mobile browser.
In GDevelop, open your game and then the: In GDevelop, open your game and then the Export window. Choose **Local folder**, click on Export and wait a few seconds to get your game ready.
On the developer page of Poki.com, get i: On the developer page of Poki.com, get in touch with Poki team or directly submit your game. Use [GDevelop JavaScript features](/javascript-game-engine) to integrate their lightweight SDK.
